entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
